trans-unit.source: Represents an asymmetric key for X.509 certificates.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that represents the X.509 certificate.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 X.509 인증서를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The cryptographic algorithm to decrypt the key.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the encrypted key.
Decrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 암호화 알고리즘을 사용하여 지정한 암호화된 키를 해독합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the decrypted key.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서에 개인 키가 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
The X.509 certificate has a private key, but it was not generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서에 개인 키가 있지만 이 개인 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 알고리즘을 사용하여 생성되지 않은 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-

The X.509 certificate has a private key, it was generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm, but the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서에 개인 키가 있고 이 개인 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 알고리즘을 사용하여 생성되었지만 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm" /> 속성이 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="algorithm" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 매개 변수가 지원되지 않는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.
The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the key to encrypt.
Encrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 암호화 알고리즘을 사용하여 지정한 암호화된 키를 암호화합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the encrypted key.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor has a public key that was not generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서에 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 알고리즘을 사용하여 생성되지 않은 공개 키가 있는 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="algorithm" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 매개 변수가 지원되지 않는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.
The asymmetric algorithm to create.
<see langword="true" /> when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 알고리즘을 만드는 데 개인 키가 필요하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.

Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> 매개 변수를 지정하려면 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 또는 `algorithm` 필드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="privateKey" /> is <see langword="true" /> and the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="privateKey" />가 <see langword="true" />이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서에 개인 키가 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" />이 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 공개 키나 개인 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> 형식이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" />이 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 공개 키나 개인 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 형식이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
The hash algorithm.
Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명에 대한 해시를 생성하는 암호화 알고리즘을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm" /> that generates hashes for digital signatures.

Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> 매개 변수를 지정하려면 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 또는 `algorithm` 필드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 가져올 디지털 서명에 대한 디포맷터 알고리즘입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명에 대한 디포맷터 알고리즘을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명에 대한 디포맷터 알고리즘을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> 매개 변수를 지정하려면 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 또는 `algorithm` 필드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" />이 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 공개 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> 형식이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" />이 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 공개 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 형식이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,
<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 가져올 디지털 서명에 대한 포맷터 알고리즘입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명에 대한 포맷터 알고리즘을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명에 대한 포맷터 알고리즘을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> 매개 변수를 지정하려면 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 또는 `algorithm` 필드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서에 개인 키가 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" />이 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 개인 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> 형식이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" />이 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 개인 키가 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 형식이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,
<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is a available.
trans-unit.target: 개인 키를 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the private key is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 개인 키를 사용할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 알고리즘에서 비대칭 키를 사용하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 알고리즘이 <see langword="true" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap" />이면 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에서 지정된 알고리즘을 지원하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public key is of the right type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 알고리즘이 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />이고 공개 키가 올바른 형식이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey.IsSupportedAlgorithm%2A> method returns `true` when one of the following is true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey.IsSupportedAlgorithm%2A> 메서드는 다음 조건 중 하나에 해당하면 `true`를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>.
trans-unit.target: `algorithm` 매개 변수가 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 공개 키가 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> 형식인 경우

trans-unit.source: The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.
trans-unit.target: `algorithm` 매개 변수가 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> 또는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature>이고 생성자에 지정된 X.509 인증서의 공개 키가 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> 형식인 경우

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 알고리즘에서 대칭 키를 사용하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 알고리즘이 <see langword="true" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap" />이면 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서와 연결된 공개 키의 크기(비트)를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서와 연결된 공개 키의 크기(비트)입니다.
